entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny early this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
